channel.title: Pk-Scape [Released on 11 Sept 2013]
channel.description:
[center] * Xp rates are 40x & 50x for combat skills and 20x & 25x for non-combat skills * 99 max stat * lvl 70 wild island * Replaced FATIGUE system with AFK system like StorkPk used - we have added AFK room and NPC's that teleports u back to training spot * Magical Pool for wild teleports * New subscription system. You now receive a Sub Card and u can redeem it at Sub Vendor for 30 days of subs or reset att/def/str to 1 * Npc that exchange youre coins in certs. (5m gp for 1 cert) * F2P wild zone for F2P pking. No P2P items allowed in here * Register account timer. You can register one account every 60 minutes from same IP * Skilling islands for subscribers (Island A & Island B). * Event system with event island. * Slayer skill & Slayer Master that give you task's. * Master fisher for free Trout's.
COMMAND LIST
::lottery ::fund ::stuck ::buy ID amount ::event ::online ::onlinelist ::skull ::wild ::say ::lockxp ::changepw NEW PASSWORD * ::island -> For Subscribers/Donators only
FUTURE UPDATES :
* Tutorial island (it's added but not fully working yet). * Expand Edgeville. * Batched skills. * Clan system. * New armour, new weapon & new ammy (will be a poll for that so we can see if you want it to be added or not). * 3 new herbs & 3 new pots (will be a poll for that so we can see if you want it to be added or not). [/center] [center] Forum : http://www.pk-scape.org/
Client Download :
Link 1 : http://www.fileshare.ro/e29872029
[center]Media [/center]
[img]http://i70.servimg.com/u/f70/18/46/95/56/screen25.png[/img][img]http://i70.servimg.com/u/f70/18/46/95/56/screen26.png[/img] [img]http://i70.servimg.com/u/f70/18/46/95/56/screen27.png[/img][img]http://i70.servimg.com/u/f70/18/46/95/56/screen28.png[/img] [img]http://i70.servimg.com/u/f70/18/46/95/56/screen29.png[/img][img]http://i70.servimg.com/u/f70/18/46/95/56/screen30.png[/img] [img]http://i70.servimg.com/u/f70/18/46/95/56/screen31.png[/img][img]http://i70.servimg.com/u/f70/18/46/95/56/screen32.png[/img] [img]http://i70.servimg.com/u/f70/18/46/95/56/screen33.png[/img][img]http://i70.servimg.com/u/f70/18/46/95/56/screen34.png[/img] [img]http://i70.servimg.com/u/f70/18/46/95/56/screen35.png[/img][img]http://i70.servimg.com/u/f70/18/46/95/56/screen36.png[/img]

item.title: Pk-Scape [Released on 11 Sept 2013]
item.dc:creator: @Pk_Sars1 Pk_Sars
item.description:
@Pk_Sars1 wrote:

14 online at 12:30 am PST due to new Halloween Quest thank you printz it was fun good loot too everyone loves pixels =)

First receive the quest from Halloween Master On ICE Mountain.

He will tell you to kill 4 NPCS for his Halloween Costume:
First is Evil Gnome NW of Ardy Fishing Guild next to waterfall-

Next is Mummy SW of Ardy at Battlefield-

Then the Black Devil on Karamja (Mask)-

Lastly The baby black dragon(Hymera the dragon) Located southern part of Al Kharid. He Drops 2 items 1 (Halloween shirt) and (Halloween Pants) so you gotta farm him till you get both.

After you Receive all 5 items. Return to ice mountain and get your reward ( rewards are random but fun =) )

thank you and enjoy from your Pk-Scape Team

Read full topic

item.title: Pk-Scape [Released on 11 Sept 2013]
item.dc:creator: @Artemis_Wp Artemis Wp
item.description:
@Artemis_Wp wrote:

  • Added lvl 10 Altar teleport to Magical pool

  • Rock of Ages is now aggresive

  • Re-writed runecrafting method so now bloods, deaths, laws, natures. You can get more runes from essence depends on your lvl.

  • Added Rune Ess Certificate

  • Starter kit : full steel +2h

  • Start location - Edge bank corner

  • Rock of ages HP + Def raised

  • Adjusted drops and drop rates

  • Halloween event is done (will be added on 30.10.2013)

  • Replaced Combat Tab Menu with Event Tab Menu

  • Fixed Quest list bug

  • Added santa suit + candy cane

  • Added toys for Christmas event

  • Added Santa and Santa’s Elfs for Christmas

  • Removed custom items ( Mask, Hats, Armours, Weps )

  • New dungeon for rune ess. You can teleport here from Varrock (same location NPC)

  • Added some missing ladder’s on map

  • Added Dragon Picaxe & Dragon Hatchet

  • Implemented BSH system for NPC’s

Client download : http://fileshare.ro/e29923750

Read full topic

item.title: Pk-Scape [Released on 11 Sept 2013]
item.dc:creator: @Artemis_Wp Artemis Wp
item.description:
@Artemis_Wp wrote:

[quote=“Stealmojo, post:50, topic:529859”]Keep it up Printz, I may drop by on the 11th, see you soon.
-Snowman
-T E A

You remember me, a lot of you do.[/quote]

Thx Snowman, hope to see you online soon.

  • Raised drop rates for klanks
  • Raised drop rates for herbs on druids
  • Raised drop rates for limpwortroots for Giants and Hobgoblins
  • Rock Of Ages rare drops are : D med, Half D sq and Gift Box !
  • Incrased alchemy prices for D long, D axe, D med & Half Dsq !
  • Changed Info Guide appearance !
  • Runecrafting is now full working !

Client download : http://www.fileshare.ro/e29906994

Hello, as you know we just released our 20th skill, Runecrafting. Actually it work without talismans, you just need to use Rune Essences on Altars and that’s all.

  • Start your adventure in Varrock where you need to find Rune Ess Teleporter, which is located in front of Staff Shop. Talk him to go in & out of rune ess mine.

  • Altar locations & lvl required :

  1. Air-rune altar - South of Falador & lvl required 1

  2. Fire-rune altar - Al Kharid Desert & lvl required 14

  3. Earth-rune altar - N-E of Varrock (between Varrock & Dig Site Camp) & lvl required 9

  4. Body-rune altar - S-W of Edgeville & lvl required 20

  5. Mind-rune altar - North of Falador (on the road to wild) & lvl required 2

  6. Water-rune altar - Lumbridge Swamp & lvl required 5

  7. Chaos-rune altar - lvl 9 wild N of Edgeville & lvl required 35

  8. Cosmic-rune altar - White Wolf Ice Mountain & lvl required 27

  9. Nature-rune altar - N-E of Shilo Village & lvl required 44

  10. Law-rune altar - Wild lvl 27, N of Varrock & lvl required 54

  11. Death-rune altar - Wild lvl 52, E of Mage Arena & lvl required 65

  12. Blood-rune altar - Wild lvl 52, W of Mage Arena & lvl required 77

  13. Soul-rune altar - N-W of Yanille & lvl required 90

See you in game !

Read full topic

item.title: Pk-Scape [Released on 11 Sept 2013]
item.dc:creator: @Artemis_Wp Artemis Wp
item.description:
@Artemis_Wp wrote:

As you know I opened the official server on 11 September, and I am glad to see you still here. On October 11th we will make one month runing online and I decided to do a little event to celebrate that.

What will be the event ?

  • Well I decided to do a drop party where things will randomly appear in certain cities in the game. To be exact cities will be the following : Varrock, Falador, Draynor & Edgeville.

  • Will drop : Rune items, Adamantite items, Mithril items, Amulets and more.

  • Main drops will be 2 x Sub Card and 10 x Gift Box !!

  • More events will show up on 11 & 31 Oct too ! Stay tuned

  • P.S : You can get a random item from Gift Box … can be a rare too. (no junks from Gift Box)

Happy B-Day & Enjoy server !

Best regards,
Printz ~

Read full topic

item.title: Pk-Scape [Released on 11 Sept 2013]
item.dc:creator: @xAdyx xAdyx
item.description:
@xAdyx wrote:

[center]1. Slayer system re-wrote.

  1. Ingame password changer implemented into the client.

  2. Slayer task cancelling implemented.

  3. Runecrafting skill implemented into the skill array. This now gives PK-Scape 20 skills in total.

  4. Moderation Menu implemented into the client.

  5. SubVendor class fixed so that you can’t reset attack, defense and strength without a subscription card.

  6. Log cutting batched for Fletching. This will batch the menu options (so you don’t have to keep clicking the knife on the log).

  7. Quest list added. Now displays all quests.

  8. Quest list modified for the current quests that are completable.

  9. Stats menu bug fixed. Fletching and Agility will now display correctly, as well as Slayer.

  10. Quest Points re-implemented to the stats menu.

  11. Required Exp removed from the stats menu.

  12. Range equipment bonus removed from the stats menu.

  13. Smelting is now batched for Smithing.

  14. Pk Menu it’s now added. You can toggle ON/OFF by pressing F2 button.

  15. Pk ranks based on Ratio added.

  16. Kill notifier added.

  17. Manta Ray & Sea Turtle certificates are now added.

  18. Herbs drop rate was incrased for Druids.

  19. Runes amount drop was incrased for Dragons & Demons.

Download client link : http://www.fileshare.ro/e29894748[/center]

Best regards,
PkScape Staff & Developing Team !

Read full topic
